recommendations.title: Implement Complete Security Headers
recommendations.description: Ensure all critical security headers are properly configured
recommendations.impact: Prevents XSS, clickjacking, and other security vulnerabilities

recommendations.title: Optimize Core Web Vitals
recommendations.description: Focus on page loading performance and user experience metrics
recommendations.impact: Improves search engine rankings and user satisfaction

recommendations.title: Enhance Structured Data
recommendations.description: Add comprehensive schema markup for better search visibility
recommendations.impact: Enables rich snippets and improved search appearance

recommendations.title: Review Content Security Policy
recommendations.description: Regularly audit and tighten CSP directives
recommendations.impact: Reduces XSS attack surface while maintaining functionality

issues: H3 elements without H2 parent headings
recommendations: Consider including relevant keywords like "Bitcoin" in title
Consider adding H2 headings to structure content
Ensure proper heading hierarchy (H1 > H2 > H3)
Consider adding robots meta tag for search engine control
Add internal links to improve site navigation and SEO
Consider including relevant keywords like "Bitcoin" in title

description.content: Learn about test integration at Bitcoin Sovereign Academy. Interactive Bitcoin education with hands-on exercises and expert guidance.

issues: H3 elements without H2 parent headings
recommendations: Consider adding H2 headings to structure content
Ensure proper heading hierarchy (H1 > H2 > H3)
Consider adding robots meta tag for search engine control
Add internal links to improve site navigation and SEO
Add strict-transport-security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

Add content-security-policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https:; font-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https:
Add x-frame-options: DENY
Add x-content-type-options: nosniff
Consider adding referrer-policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
Consider adding permissions-policy: camera=(), microphone=(), geolocation=(), payment=()
Consider adding x-xss-protection: 1; mode=block
Add strict-transport-security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

recommendations.title: Implement HSTS
recommendations.description: Add Strict-Transport-Security header to enforce HTTPS
recommendations.implementation: Add header: Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

recommendations.title: Implement Content Security Policy
recommendations.description: Add CSP header to prevent XSS and data injection attacks
recommendations.implementation: Add header: Content-Security-Policy with appropriate directives

recommendations.title: Implement X-Frame-Options
recommendations.description: Add X-Frame-Options header to prevent clickjacking

recommendations.title: Implement X-Content-Type-Options
recommendations.description: Add X-Content-Type-Options header to prevent MIME sniffing
